alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 4:41PM EDT until August 10 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 441 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Havana to 11 miles northwest of Monticello, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cairo, Thomasville, Bainbridge, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Whigham, Attapulgus, Barwick, Climax, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Capel, Dillon, Enon, Rocky Hill, Merrillville, Chastain, Harrells Still and Laingkat. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
